description: Notification Under The Electronic Communications Code Regulations 2003 To Utilise Permitted Development Rights - Proposed 4 No. apertures to be mounted on new raised steel pod c/w steps, open mesh decking, kickplate and handrail. Roof pod to be mounted on new raised steel grillage c/w handrail and access ladder. To be installed on proposed R/C plinths. 1No. 6000 dish to be installed on new braced support pole fixed proposed steel grillage. RRUs & router to be mounted on support poles on roof pods. RRUs & routers on new support poles fixed into new RC plinths. 4No. apertures to be mounted on new raised steel pod c/w steps, open mesh decking, kickplate and handrail. Roof pod to be mounted on new raised steel grillage c/w handrail and access ladder. To be installed on proposed R/C plinths. RRUs & routers to be mounted on support poles on roof pods. 1 No. 6000 dish to be installed on new braced support pole fixed on proposed steel grillage.
